column4: logs? files not cleaned from apt?  how much space did you have on it last time you checked, prior to this issue?
I hadn't checked at all until now when I started having the problem. Bad practice on my part. Can I delete logs and clean apt to get some space back?
oooooooh sorry, i did not mean to not answer you

That is OK. I was patiently waiting for a response from you or anyone else who can offer advice. The wonderful thing about Ubuntu is this channel to get help. I know someone will answer me at sometime.
